Error: 404 Not Found.

Please make sure the playlist is 'Public'.

chat.err_cmd_perm_subscribers: @{user} You must be a subscriber to use this command.
chat.err_cmd_perm_moderators: @{user} Only moderators can use this command.
chat.err_cmd_perm_broadcaster: @{user} Only the broadcaster can use this command.

chat.err_no_playback: @{user} Spotify is not playing anything right now.
chat.err_not_found: @{user} Could not find the song. Check spelling or link.

help.title: Help & Documentation
help.text:
‚òÖ HELP - TWITCH SR BOT v0.9.9 ‚òÖ

Official documentation for the modern EventSub-based Twitch Song Request Bot.

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 1. GETTING STARTED ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ TWITCH SETUP:
  1. Go to https://dev.twitch.tv/console
  2. Create a new app (e.g., 'MySRBot')
  3. OAuth Redirect URL: http://localhost:3000
  4. Note down Client ID & Client Secret
  5. In Bot: Click 'Settings' ‚Üí 'Twitch Login' tab
  6. Enter your channel name (e.g., 'uprisin6')
  7. Click the token link for automatic OAuth2 authentication
  8. Scopes are set automatically (user:read:chat, user:write:chat, user:bot)

‚ñ∏ SPOTIFY SETUP:
  1. Go to https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard
  2. Create a new app
  3. Redirect URI: http://localhost:8888/callback
  4. Note down Client ID & Client Secret
  5. In Bot: 'Spotify API' tab ‚Üí Enter credentials
  6. On first start, browser opens for login

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 2. COMMAND PERMISSIONS ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ FLEXIBLE PERMISSION SYSTEM:
  Every chat command can be configured individually!
  ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí 'Command Permissions' tab
  
  Permission Levels:
  ‚Ä¢ Everyone: All viewers
  ‚Ä¢ Followers: Only channel followers
  ‚Ä¢ Subscribers: Only subs
  ‚Ä¢ Moderators: Mods + Broadcaster
  ‚Ä¢ Broadcaster: Only the streamer

‚ñ∏ FOLLOWER CHECK:
  ‚Ä¢ Uses Twitch Helix API
  ‚Ä¢ Results cached for 5 minutes
  ‚Ä¢ Automatic chat notification

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 3. RULES & LIMITS ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ Max. Songs in Queue: Maximum queue size (e.g., 10)
‚ñ∏ Max. per User: How many songs per user simultaneously (e.g., 2)
‚ñ∏ Max. Length: Maximum song duration in minutes (e.g., 8)
‚ñ∏ Cooldown: Minutes until a song can be requested again (e.g., 30)
‚ñ∏ User Cooldown: Minutes between requests per user (0 = disabled)

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 4. BLACKLIST SYSTEM ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ BLOCK SONGS & ARTISTS:
  ‚Ä¢ Settings ‚Üí 'Blacklist' tab
  ‚Ä¢ Add songs/artists individually (one per line)
  ‚Ä¢ Partial-match & case-insensitive
  ‚Ä¢ Live updates without restart
  
‚ñ∏ CHAT MANAGEMENT:
  !addblacklist <name>      - Adds song/artist (Mods)
  !removeblacklist <name>   - Removes from blacklist (Mods)
  !blacklist                - Shows current blacklist

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 5. SMART VOTING ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ WHAT IS SMART VOTING?
  When multiple users request the same song:
  ‚Ä¢ Song is NOT added twice to the queue
  ‚Ä¢ Instead, the song receives +1 Vote
  ‚Ä¢ Songs with more votes move up in the queue
  ‚Ä¢ Democratic song request system!

‚ñ∏ EXAMPLE:
  User1: !sr Bohemian Rhapsody ‚Üí Song added (1 Vote)
  User2: !sr Bohemian Rhapsody ‚Üí +1 Vote (now 2 Votes)
  User3: !sr Bohemian Rhapsody ‚Üí +1 Vote (now 3 Votes)
  ‚Üí Song moves up in the queue!

‚ñ∏ ENABLE/DISABLE:
  ‚Ä¢ Toggle switch in main GUI (top right)
  ‚Ä¢ Can be changed anytime during operation
  ‚Ä¢ Vote counts remain, just not sorted

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 6. AUTOPILOT PLAYLIST ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ PURPOSE: Automatically plays music when queue is empty
‚ñ∏ SETUP:
  1. Create a playlist on Spotify
  2. Set it to PUBLIC (very important!)
  3. Copy the playlist link
  4. Paste it into 'Autopilot Playlist'
‚ñ∏ Bot automatically switches between requests and autopilot

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 7. CHAT COMMANDS ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ FOR VIEWERS:
  !sr <songname>            - Searches and adds song
  !sr <Spotify-Link>        - Adds song directly via link
  !currentsong / !song      - Shows currently playing song
  !songinfo                 - Shows details about current song (album, year, length, popularity)
  !queue                    - Shows queue (first 5)
  !wrongsong / !oops        - Removes own last request
  !blacklist                - Shows blocked songs/artists
  !srhelp / !commands       - Shows this command list

‚ñ∏ FOR MODS/BROADCASTER:
  !skip                     - Skips current song
  !clearqueue               - Clears entire queue
  !addblacklist <name>      - Adds to blacklist
  !removeblacklist <name>   - Removes from blacklist
  !pauserequests            - Pauses song requests (e.g. for Just Chatting)
  !resumerequests           - Resumes song requests
  !pausesr                  - Pauses Spotify playback
  !resumesr                 - Resumes Spotify playback

‚ñ∏ NOTE:
  All command permissions are configurable!
  ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Command Permissions

‚ñ∏ EXAMPLES:
  !sr Never Gonna Give You Up
  !sr https://open.spotify.com/track/4cOdK2wGLETKBW3PvgPWqT
  !wrongsong
  !addblacklist Nickelback

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 8. GUI FEATURES ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ MAIN CONTROLS:
  ‚Ä¢ START/STOP: Control bot connection
  ‚Ä¢ Force Play: Play selected song immediately
  ‚Ä¢ Skip: Skip current song
  ‚Ä¢ Clear All: Empty entire queue
  ‚Ä¢ Smart Voting: On/Off (Toggle top right)

‚ñ∏ SETTINGS TABS:
  ‚Ä¢ Rules & Limits: Queue size, cooldowns, song length
  ‚Ä¢ Blacklist: Block songs/artists
  ‚Ä¢ Command Permissions: Set permissions per command
  ‚Ä¢ Twitch Login: Channel, token, API keys
  ‚Ä¢ Spotify API: Client credentials, fallback playlist

‚ñ∏ DEBUG LOG:
  ‚Ä¢ Toggle button shows/hides technical logs
  ‚Ä¢ Helpful for troubleshooting
  ‚Ä¢ Shows TwitchIO EventSub events, API calls, etc.

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ 9. TECHNICAL INFO ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚ñ∏ ARCHITECTURE:
  ‚Ä¢ TwitchIO 3.x with EventSub WebSocket
  ‚Ä¢ No IRC connection anymore (modern API)
  ‚Ä¢ Spotify Web API with OAuth2
  ‚Ä¢ Asynchronous event processing

‚ñ∏ FEATURES v0.9.9:
  ‚úì Real-time chat integration
  ‚úì Flexible command permission system
  ‚úì User & song cooldowns (anti-spam)
  ‚úì Blacklist system (songs & artists)
  ‚úì Smart voting system (democratic queue)
  ‚úì Multi-language support (DE/EN)
  ‚úì Dark mode UI
  ‚úì Live config updates

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ SUPPORT & LINKS ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ

‚Ä¢ GitHub: github.com/Brunsben/TwitchSpotifySRBot
‚Ä¢ Twitch Dev Console: dev.twitch.tv/console
‚Ä¢ Spotify Dashboard: developer.spotify.com/dashboard
‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting: See TROUBLESHOOTING.md in repo

‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ‚îÅ
Dev: uprisin6 | Version 1.0.0
Have fun streaming! üéµ
